sentence.text: The schizophrenia-associated gene GRIN2A (glutamate ionotropic receptor NMDA type subunit 2a) codes for a protein subunit of the NMDA (N-methyl-D-aspartate) receptor that underlies central aspects of human cognition.

The results also suggest that some schizophrenia-related alleles may be subject to cognitive tradeoffs involving both positive and negative effects on psychological phenotypes, which may help to explain the maintenance of psychiatric-disorder risk alleles in human populations
